lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos are awaiting Aqib Talib's return to team headquarters Wednesday so they can begin charting the cornerback's recovery from a gunshot wound to his right leg.

headline.print_headline: Super Bowl Champs Begin Minicamp Without Aqib Talib
headline.main: Super Bowl Champs Begin Minicamp Without Aqib Talib
